TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IgnoreAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.NUnitAttribute implements class NUnit.Framework.Internal.IApplyToTest

Docs.summary: Attribute used to mark a test that is to be ignored. Ignored tests result in a warning message when the tests are run.

Docs.summary: Constructs the attribute without giving a reason for ignoring the test.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string reason) cil managed

Docs.param: The reason for ignoring the test
Docs.summary: Constructs the attribute giving a reason for ignoring the test

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyToTest(class NUnit.Framework.Internal.Test test) cil managed

Docs.summary: Modifies a test by marking it as Ignored.
